SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

weka.classifiers.mlr
Class MLRClassifier

java.lang.Object
  weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      weka.classifiers.mlr.MLRClassifier
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Classifier, BatchPredictor, CapabilitiesHandler, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler
public class MLRClassifier
extends AbstractClassifier
implements OptionHandler, CapabilitiesHandler, BatchPredictor, RevisionHandler, java.io.Serializable

Wrapper classifier for the MLRClassifier package. This class delegates (via reflection) to MLRClassifierImpl. MLRClassifierImpl uses REngine/JRI classes so has to be injected into the root class loader.

Version:
$Revision: 50377 $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
See Also:
Serialized Form
